module:
Module-level comment: 

The 'processor_echo' module applies an 'echo' effect on 10-bit digital signals. It uses 'sysclk' for sequencing and 'data_valid' to verify input data 'data_in'. The output 'data_out' combines the processed signal with a DAC offset. Internally, the module generates a write request 'wrreq' using pulse_gen on data validation. A flip-flop 'rdreq_dff' coordinates FIFO read requests contingent on 'full' and 'wrreq'. 'echo', sourced from the FIFO buffer, adds delay to output, creating the 'echo' effect. Two 'always' blocks are used for managing FIFO read requests and producing 'data_out'.
